## General Multiplication Rule:

$P(A \text{ and } B) = P(A|B)P(B)$

## Law of Total Probability:

$P(A) = P(A|B_1)P(B_1)+P(A|B_2)P(B_2)+â€¦+P(A|B_k)P(B_k)$

Where each $B_i$ is disjoint.

## Conditional Probability

$P(A|B) = \frac{P(B|A)P(A)}{P(B)}$
